'''Aquanigma''' is a [[Quest Domain]] during the {{Quest|When All Return to the Waters}}.

==Walkthrough==
# Defeat enemies {{Enemy List|Recon Log Mek*2;Arithmetic Enhancer Mek}}
# Start mechanism to activate elevator
# Proceed deeper within
# [[Dive]] down into the water
#* Use [[Xenochromatic Creature|Xenochromatic Armored Crab]]'s ability to break wall
# Start mechanism to raise water level
# Proceed deeper within
# Defeat enemies
#* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Area Alert Mek*2;Recon Log Mek}}
#* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Geological Survey Mek*2;Recon Log Mek}}
#* Rewards an [[Exquisite Chest]]
# Start mechanism to raise water level
# Proceed deeper within
# Start mechanism to access next room
# Defeat enemies {{Enemy List|Assault Specialist Mek;Suppression Specialist Mek}}
# Proceed to the innermost part of the headquarters
# [[Investigation|Investigate]] all items
# Exit domain (Archon Quest progresses)

==Chests==
<!-- * Common Chest &times;2 --> 
* Common Chest x2 (to the Left of the entrance to the second room, accessible after clearing the first few Meks, after raising the water and proceeding deeper into the domain, the chest will be visible after to the left of the room with the mechanism to open the door to the final chamber)
* Exquisite Chest &times;1 (after defeating the second group of enemies)

==Gameplay Notes==
* Prior to entering the first room, the player can change their [[Party]] Setup by interacting with the large, floating green symbol.
* All enemies are [[Ousia]]-aligned meks.
